dt: {bc}the academic degree, title, or rank of {d_link|doctor of philosophy|doctor of philosophy}

dt.t: He was awarded a {wi}PhD{/wi} in economics.

dt: {bc}a person who has earned the academic degree of doctor of philosophy

dt.t: The Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory Watson School of Biological Sciences graduated its first {wi}PhDs{/wi} (14 of them) in June 2004 …

shortdef: the academic degree, title, or rank of doctor of philosophy; also : a person who has earned the academic degree of doctor of philosophy
